title: Proposed Vaccine Mandate In Montgomery County Is An 'Outrageous Intrusion,' Say Union Leaders
description: Most Montgomery County employees say they're vaccinated, but county lawmakers want to impose a requirement just in case.
cleaned_text: This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible.
